name: Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Stover v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of June, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
93 A.3d 804
Gregory STOVER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, PA., Respondent.
No. 45 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 12, 2014.
